snippet: Jade Helm 15, a seven-state training exercise that the Army and local officials say is no cause for alarm, has generated paranoia for months, fueled by conservative bloggers.
abstract: Residents of Christoval, Tex, find that military exercise dubbed Jade Helm 15 has had little impact on their lives on first day of its eight-week duration; exercise involving several branches of military, including Special Operations troops, is taking place in Texas and five other states; residents around Christoval had expressed wide range of fears, fueled by conservative bloggers and postings on Internet.
lead_paragraph: Jade Helm 15, a seven-state training exercise that the Army and local officials say is no cause for alarm, has generated paranoia for months, fueled by conservative bloggers.

headline.main: As Jade Helm 15 Military Exercise Begins, Texans Keep Watch ‘Just in Case’
headline.print_headline: Unscathed as War Games Begin, Texans Keep Watch, ‘Just in Case’

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
